text: Mr. Thorneycroft, the Minister of Aviation, who arrives in Bonn tomorrow for talks with the Federal Government on a European space satellite project, will find the Germans interested in the principle of space research, but rather sceptical about British plans for organizing it. Stated more bluntly, they are still unconvinced that this is not primarily an effort on Britain's part, abandoned last summer as a military project; or that the new European space satellite is indeed to be purely scientific in character.
handwritten_text: Mr. Thorneycroft, the Minister of Aviation, who arrives in Bonn tomorrow for talks with the Federal Government on a European space satellite project, will find the Germans interested in the principle of space research, but rather sceptical about British plans for organizing it. Stated more bluntly, they are still unconvinced that this is not primarily an effort on Britain's part, abandoned last summer as a military project; or that the new European space satellite is indeed to be purely scientific in character.
